About Us

our profile

Stephanie Gross is the President and CEO of SG & Associates, LLC (SG&A) a construction contractor providing all functions of light construction including; framing, masonry, HVAC, finishing and electrical as well as building cleaning services.

Stephanie has a passion for excellence and a commitment to setting standards for quality and client satisfaction. Her reputation demonstrates a firsthand approach with quick and efficient solutions. Leading all functions of construction project management including planning, designing, processing, specs-approvals, managing staff, supervising sub-contractors, budgeting, scheduling, progress reporting and timely completion of projects, Stephanie puts together a team that becomes strategic business partner for her customers.

SG&A began its life in the business of providing residential and commercial cleaning services designed to cover all facets of sanitary maintenance, including carpet cleaning, floor polishing/buffing, pressure washing, and air purification. SG&A offered high-quality and innovative cleaning techniques performed by an efficient and courteous staff of industry professionals. While performing contracts for large companies, SG&A was asked if the company performs as a general contractor. We acquired the licenses, structure, management, and relationships to be successful. From pre-construction and design-build services to safety and quality management programs.

SG&A is a Maryland-based corporation, founded in 2012, a woman-owned small business that participates in the Small Business Administration 8(a) program. Certifications included; WOSB/SBA, MBE/MDOT, Prince George's County, CB-17/Country Certification, and SBE/SBR. SG&A also has a construction licence in the state of Maryland.

Who We Are

We are an 8(a), minority, woman-owned business. We provide quality service to public and private industries in addition to government contracting.
